languages.text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Когда псайкеры черпают энергию варпа, чтобы усилить свои {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, всегда есть опасность, что силы Эмпиреев проникнут в реальность. Любое подобное действие подтачивает барьер между мирами и может обернуться катастрофой.
Как правило, в начале боя истончение завесы равно 0. Это значение увеличивается на 1 при каждом применении малой {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} и на 3 при каждом применении значимой психосилы. При этом каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} значение уменьшается на 1.

traits.locale_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their abilities, there is always the chance of the empyrean bleeding into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor psychic power and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each round.

When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Когда псайкер черпает энергию варпа, чтобы усилить свои способности, всегда есть опасность, что силы Эмпирей проникнут в реальность. Любое подобное действие подтачивает барьер между мирами и может обернуться катастрофой.
Как правило, в начале боя истончение завесы равно 0. Это значение увеличивается на 1 при каждом применении малой психосилы и на 3 при каждом применении значимой психосилы. При этом каждый раунд значение уменьшается на 1.

Когда псайкер черпает энергию варпа, чтобы усилить свои способности, всегда есть опасность, что силы Эмпирей проникнут в реальность. Любое подобное действие подтачивает барьер между мирами и может обернуться катастрофой.
Как правило, в начале боя истончение завесы равно 0. Это значение увеличивается на 1 при каждом применении малой психосилы и на 3 при каждом применении значимой психосилы. При этом каждый раунд значение уменьшается на 1.

languages.text:
Wenn Psioniker tiefer in den Warp greifen, um ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} zu verstärken, besteht immer die Möglichkeit, dass das Empyreum in unsere Realität {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}eindringt{/g}, was immer destruktiv und schädlich ist.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes ist der Zerfall des Schleiers in der Regel 0. Der Zerfall des Schleiers erhöht sich um +1 für jeden Einsatz kleinerer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischer Kräfte{/g} und um +3 für jeden Einsatz großer psionischer Kräfte. Er verringert sich jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um −1.
languages.original_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn Psioniker tiefer in den Warp greifen, um ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} zu verstärken, besteht immer die Möglichkeit, dass das Empyreum in unsere Realität {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}eindringt{/g}, was immer destruktiv und schädlich ist.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes ist der {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} in der Regel 0. Der Zerfall des Schleiers erhöht sich um +1 für jeden Einsatz kleinerer psionischer Kräfte und um +3 für jeden Einsatz großer psionischer Kräfte. Er verringert sich jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um −1.

languages.text:
Lorsque les psykers s'enfoncent dans le Warp pour alimenter leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, il y a toujours un risque que l'Empyrée {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}s'insinue{/g} dans notre réalité, ce qui est immanquablement destructeur et préjudiciable.
Au début du combat, la dégradation du voile est généralement de 0. Elle augmente de +1 à chaque utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} mineur et de +3 à chaque utilisation d'un pouvoir psychique majeur, et diminue de −1 à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque les psykers s'enfoncent dans le Warp pour alimenter leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, il y a toujours un risque que l'Empyrée {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}s'infiltre{/g} dans notre réalité, ce qui est immanquablement destructeur et préjudiciable.
Au début du combat, la valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du voile{/g} est généralement de 0. Elle augmente de +1 à chaque utilisation d'un pouvoir psychique mineur et de +3 à chaque utilisation d'un pouvoir psychique majeur, et diminue de -1 à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
每当灵能者潜入亚空间深处汲取力量时，都可能会导致亚空间渗入现实世界之中。来自亚空间的影响无一例外充满了破坏性，会带来损各个方面的损害。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}{/g}
每场战斗开始时，障壁恶化程度通常是从0开始的。使用次要{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}会使障壁恶化程度提高1点，使用主要灵能能力会使障壁恶化程度提高3点。当新一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，障壁恶化状况会降低1点。
languages.original_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每当灵能者潜入亚空间深处汲取力量时，都可能会导致亚空间渗入现实世界之中。来自亚空间的影响无一例外充满了破坏性，会带来损各个方面的损害。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}{/g}
每场战斗开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度通常是从0开始的。使用次要灵能力量会使障壁恶化程度提高1点，使用主要灵能力量会使障壁恶化程度提高3点。当新一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，障壁恶化状况会降低1点。

languages.text:
Cuando los psíquicos se adentran en la disformidad para potenciar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, siempre existe la posibilidad de que el Empíreo entre en nuestra realidad, lo que tiene consecuencias destructivas y dañinas.{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}{/g}
Al principio del combate, el desgaste del velo suele ser de 0. El desgaste del velo aumenta en 1 por cada uso de un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} menor y en 3 por cada uso de un poder mayor. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, también se reduce en −1
languages.original_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando los psíquicos se adentran en la disformidad para potenciar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, siempre existe la posibilidad de que el Empíreo entre en nuestra realidad, lo que tiene consecuencias destructivas y dañinas.{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}{/g}
Al principio del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}desgaste del velo{/g} suele ser de 0. El desgaste del velo aumenta en 1 por cada uso de un poder psíquico menor y en 3 por cada uso de un poder mayor. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, también se reduce en -1

languages.original_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their abilities, there is always the chance of the empyrean bleeding into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by 1 for each use of minor psychic power and by 3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by 1 each round.

languages.text:
異能者が<歪み>の深部に入って自らの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の強さを上げるときは、こちら側にエンピリアンが{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出現する{/g}恐れが常にあり、有害かつ被害に見舞われる要因となっている。
戦闘開始時、ヴェールの劣化は通常0である。ヴェールの劣化は、弱い{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使うたびに+1増加し、強い超能力を使うたびに+3増加する。さらに毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}-1減少する。
languages.original_text:
When psykers reach deeper into the warp to power their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, there is always the chance of the Empyrean {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} into our reality, a factor that is invariably destructive and damaging.
At the beginning of the combat, veil degradation is usually 0. Veil degradation increases by +1 for each use of minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and by +3 for each use of major psychic power, and decreases by −1 each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
異能者が<歪み>の深部に入って自らの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の強さを上げるときは、こちら側にエンピリアンが{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出現する{/g}恐れが常にあり、有害かつ被害に見舞われる要因となっている。
戦闘開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}は通常0である。ヴェールの劣化は、弱小超能力を使うたびに+1増加し、強大超能力を使うたびに+3増加する。また、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに−1減少する。
